name: Ultimate Twice Baked Potatoes
author: PONYGIRL64
summary: I made these up years ago and have been making them ever since. They are always a big hit. These potatoes make a wonderful side dish for any meal and are terrific heated up the next day for lunch.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake potatoes in preheated oven for 1 hour
Meanwhile,  place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
When potatoes are done allow them to cool for 10 minutes
Slice potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop the flesh into a large bowl; save skins
To the potato flesh add sour cream, milk, butter, salt, pepper, 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 the green onions
Mix with a hand mixer until well blended and creamy
Spoon the mixture into the potato skins
Top each with remaining cheese, green onions and bacon
